api_key_required.message: API key from sms77.io required for sending

api_key_set.message: Please head to the options page and set your API key in order to send SMS.

from_info.message: Please notice that if you set a 'from' value you will not be asked again before sending SMS.

to_info.message: Please notice that if you set a 'to' value you will not be asked again before sending SMS.

signature_label.message: Signature added to all outgoing messages

prompt_from.message: You may enter a sender identifier. You can set a default one in the settings.

prompt_to.message: Please enter a recipient phone number or address book entry.

error_text.message: You must specify a valid SMS message content.

error_to.message: You must specify a valid recipient phone number or address book entry.

error_url.message: Invalid URL for request: '$url$'. Please contact Sms77 on info@sms77.io.

sms_dispatch_error.message: An error occurred while sending SMS to '$to$'. The returned error code is: '$errorCode$'.
